newCmd.newCmd_description: Add new command <cmdName> with [argNames...]. Also creates a file cmdName.py.
newCmd.argName: (argName...), Optional names of argument to associate with the new command.

modCmd.modCmd_description: Modify a command or argument discriptions, or add another argument for command. The cmdName.py file will not be modified.
modCmd.argName: (argName...) Optional names of argument(s) to modify.

rmCmd.rmCmd_description: Remove <cmdName> and delete file cmdName.py, or remove an argument for a command.
rmCmd.cmdName: Name of command to remove, cmdName.py and other commands listed as argument(s) will be delated.
rmCmd.argName: Optional names of argument to remove.v It is and I am both pi.

fetchData.fetchData_description: Fetch web data for Monte Carlo analysis. Supports APIs, CSV, JSON endpoints.
fetchData.url: Web URL or API endpoint to fetch data from
fetchData.columns: Comma-separated column names to extract (optional, extracts all if not specified)
fetchData.format: Data format: json, csv, api (auto-detected if not specified)

setCorrelation.setCorrelation_description: Define statistical relationships between data columns for Monte Carlo simulation.
setCorrelation.dataset: Name of previously fetched dataset to analyze
setCorrelation.column1: First column name for correlation analysis
setCorrelation.column2: Second column name for correlation analysis
setCorrelation.method: Correlation method: pearson, spearman, kendall (default: pearson)

runSim.runSim_description: Execute Monte Carlo simulation on web data to analyze randomness patterns.
runSim.variables: Comma-separated list of variables to simulate

plotResults.plotResults_description: Generate matplotlib visualizations of Monte Carlo simulation results.
plotResults.dataset: Name of simulation results to visualize
plotResults.plottype: Plot type: histogram, scatter, correlation, convergence, all
plotResults.save: Save plots to file (optional filename, default: display only)

listSources.listSources_description: List the current set of public data sources
listSources.category: The catagory for the public data

listPlots.listPlots_description: List all generated visualization plots and their details.
listPlots.filter: Optional filter by simulation name or plot type
